channel.title: Eclipse-Rsps Knights Assult || New Skilling || Good Combat || GREAT base ||
channel.description: [size=14pt]I know this isn't very use full but ill release it anyway. :D[/size] [center][size=14pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center] I was working on this for a few weeks and didnt know where to go with it. So i guess ill just release it. Ive done a significant amount of work to this and should be stable/decent enough to use as a base. [center]Feature's[/center] -100% Runecrafting and Rift added. -100% Woodcutting and Firemaking added with new zone - Herblore Skill redone - Smithing 95% - Farming 50-65% - Home - New Slayer challenges - Knight's Assult Minigame added - New boss drop's added - ECT. ~enjoy~ [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/newhome.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/stalls.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/PkPshop.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/weaponandacc.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/newdonor.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/pkingarea.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/skills1.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/skills2.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/minning.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/fishingandcook.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/wcandfm.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/herb.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/agility.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/rift.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/hunter.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/knightsassut.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/kashop.png[/img] [img]http://i1055.photobucket.com/albums/s519/eclipse-rsps/bosses.png[/img] ~downloads~ client removed source removed

On Topic: If you need any assistance please let me know.

Skype - specialagentjackbower

item.title: Eclipse-Rsps Knights Assult || New Skilling || Good Combat || GREAT base ||
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[size=14pt]I know this isn’t very use full but ill release it anyway. :D[/size]
[center][size=14pt]Eclipse-Rsps[/size][/center]
I was working on this for a few weeks and didnt know where to go with it. So i guess ill just release it. Ive done a significant amount of work to this and should be stable/decent enough to use as a base.
[center]Feature’s[/center]
-100% Runecrafting and Rift added.
-100% Woodcutting and Firemaking added with new zone

  • Herblore Skill redone
  • Smithing 95%
  • Farming 50-65%
  • Home
  • New Slayer challenges
  • Knight’s Assult Minigame added
  • New boss drop’s added
  • ECT.
    ~enjoy~


















    ~downloads~
    client removed
    source removed

Read full topic
